name: SongandStory
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: A beautiful piece of music always comes with a story. From Opera to Classics, you’ll find a wide variety of piano renditions that will be familiar to you here on this short podcast. It’s a great way to learn a little more while listening to some of the most beautiful themes in our traditional musical library. Listen to the story that goes along with it, and do some research yourself. The history of music covers centuries, and the origins of some of these pieces can be understood through study of the life and times of the composer. Listen on!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
